CREATE TRIGGER secure_signups_limit_insert_trigger BEFORE INSERT ON wp_secure_signups_list_of_domains FOR EACH ROW BEGIN DECLARE row_count INT; SELECT COUNT(*) INTO row_count FROM wp_secure_signups_list_of_domains; IF row_count >= 10 THEN SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'Cannot insert more than 10 rows into wp_secure_signups_list_of_domains'; END IF; END;
